channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Moon and Me
channel.desc: The Little Cobweb. When Pepi Nana loses her red pencil, Little Nana finds it under the wardrobe.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: The Tin Bird. Animation about a family of small creatures who live on, and inside, a planet. A tin bird lands on the Clangers' planet. Tiny and Small think it wants to build a nest.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Upsy Daisy, Igglepiggle, the Bed and the Ball. Igglepiggle decides to sleep in Upsy Daisy's bed when she goes after a ball. When Upsy Daisy discovers Igglepiggle, she chases him.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Ewan McGregor - Everybody's Welcome. Everybody's welcome to join Ewan McGregor for a Bedtime Story about a caring little mouse.
